summary: Implements the Tacotron2 text‑to‑speech model as a NeMo SpectrogramGenerator, handling text preprocessing, encoder‑decoder architecture, attention alignment, loss computation, and optional logging to TensorBoard or Weights & Biases for training and inference of mel‑spectrograms.
business_intent: Enable developers to train and deploy high‑quality neural TTS systems for applications such as virtual assistants, audiobooks, and accessibility tools, by providing a ready‑to‑use Tacotron2 implementation within the NVIDIA NeMo framework.
